attributes.action: Abolish Insolvency Agency limits on payments to redundancy victims of insolvent companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having lost their jobs because of their employers incompetence, many  people find that their redundancy payments are met by the insolvency agency. Because the company went into liquidation with no assets, a worker may find his legal entitlements cut to a fraction of the legal payments. 
They will find that the unpaid holiday pay and unpaid wages may not be honoured by the insolvency agaency due to government imposed limits on payouts.
